title: The Chocolatier
description: Bailey Adams has always loved chocolate and desserts. She had longed to open a business doing just that and that day has come and gone. But now she’s finding herself struggling a bit more every day. She ​Oh what could happen with a hot guy, an emotional girl, and a stopped elevator… well… yeah. A chance encounter leads to one session after another. Soon the two wind up in TJ’s apartment. When the next morning comes and Bailey calls to schedule the appointment she comes to a shocking revelation which leads her to run. Could her slow business ever get further than three cupcakes off the ground? Follow along with Bailey and the whirlwind adventure which is her weirdness. Chocolate covered buck-eyes and caramel drop cupcakes topped with a naked elevator romp and Lamborghinis.
author: Kasey O'Grady
